医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员确定了癌症免疫治疗的潜在代谢靶点VIB-KU 鲁汶癌症生物学中心的研究人员已经确定了癌症免疫治疗的潜在靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Researchers-identify-a-pottial-metabolic-target-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Researchers-identify-a-pottial-metabolic-target-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e11ccacc-4f7b-4338-ae63-096eb61b7d02 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 09:56:29 -0400 Researchers identify a potential metabolic target for cancer immunotherapy
心脏病诊断创新——从一小时缩短到八分钟说实话https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Heart-attack-diagnosis-innovation-from-an-hour-to-eight-minutes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Heart-attack-diagnosis-innovation-from-an-hour-to-eight-minutes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f19e156-fcd2-485d-a0a0-6c9ee8cdeb42 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 09:55:00 -0400 Heart attack diagnosis innovation - from an hour to eight minutes
使用长读长 RNA 测序开发阿尔茨海默病症状前诊断工具肯塔基大学桑德斯-布朗衰老中心的研究人员正在致力于开发一种阿尔茨海默病的症状前诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Developing-pre-symptomatic-diagnostic-tools-for-Alzheimers-disease-using-long-read-RNA-sequencing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Developing-pre-symptomatic-diagnostic-tools-for-Alzheimers-disease-using-long-read-RNA-sequencing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e7bb999-d134-4ea1-96f2-e491814b6bd1 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 09:45:53 -0400 Developing pre-symptomatic diagnostic tools for Alzheimer's disease using long-read RNA sequencing
剧烈运动可减少高血压患者的认知障碍高血压患者患认知障碍（包括痴呆症）的风险较高，但维克森林大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，每周进行一次以上剧烈的体育活动可以降低这种风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Vigorous-exercise-linked-to-reduced-cognitive-impairment-in-hypertential-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Vigorous-exercise-linked-to-reduced-cognitive-impairment-in-hypertential-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82c4a365-c190-4915-8446-45d6ff3aedf6 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 09:39:13 -0400 Vigorous exercise linked to reduced cognitive impairment in hypertensive patients
较高含量的糖醇木糖醇与心血管事件风险增加相关克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现，较高含量的糖醇木糖醇与心脏病和中风等心血管事件的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Higher-amounts-of-sugar-alcohol-xylitol-linked-with-increased-risk-of-cardioangio-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Higher-amounts-of-sugar-alcohol-xylitol-induced-with-increased-risk-of-cardioangio-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=347770cf-f892-4695-83f1-b83d925849d9 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 08:58:47 -0400 Higher amounts of sugar alcohol xylitol associated with increased risk of cardiovascular events
飞行风险：酒精和机舱缺氧会扰乱睡眠质量并影响心脏健康饮酒和低压缺氧如何相互作用影响心率、血氧饱和度 (SpO2) 和睡眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Flight-risk-Alcohol-and-cabin-hypoxia-disrupts-sleep-quality-and-impacts-heart-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Flight-risk-Alcohol-and-cabin-hypoxia-disrupts-sleep-quality-and-impacts-heart-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57be3f5e-c308-4387-bc07-38035c5c4254 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 08:51:00 -0400 Flight risk: Alcohol and cabin hypoxia disrupts sleep quality and impacts heart health
青春期和成年早期的超重、肥胖与女性中风风险增加有关根据今天发表在《中风》杂志上的研究，在对 50 多年健康数据的分析中，14 岁或 31 岁时超重或肥胖的女性更有可能在 55 岁之前患上缺血性（血栓引起的）中风。 -审查了美国中风协会（美国心脏协会的一个部门）的科学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Overweight-obesity-in-adolescent-and-early-adulthood-linked-to-increased-中风-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Overweight-obesity-in-adolescent-and-early-adulthood-linked-to-increased-中风-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=667e1758-ab99-4c90-b54a-2f24822ed19e Thu, 06 Jun 2024 08:12:21 -0400 Overweight, obesity in adolescence and early adulthood linked to increased stroke risk in women
俄亥俄州立大学创建用户友好的存储库以帮助研究阿尔茨海默病一个可搜索的数据库现已准备好帮助研究阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ohio-State-creates-user-friend-repository-to-help-study-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/Ohio-State-creates-user-friend-repository-to-help-study-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=797a396d-3d9a-4d34-a196-d2dd7561b1db Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:48:00 -0400 Ohio State creates user-friendly repository to help study Alzheimer's disease
新研究揭示了牙齿缺失和假牙患者面临的隐藏挑战谢菲尔德大学的新研究发现了牙齿缺失和假牙患者面临的隐藏挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-research-reveals-hidden-challenges-faced-by-people-with-tooth-loss-and-dentures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-research-reveals-hidden-challenges-faced-by-people-with-tooth-loss-and-dentures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f60e5c14-970d-4c0e-b74c-deed9822dc79 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:44:37 -0400 New research reveals hidden challenges faced by people with tooth loss and dentures
新方法提供了一种更准确的方法，可以在诊断前九年预测痴呆症伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员开发了一种新的痴呆症预测方法，准确率超过 80%，且可在诊断前九年进行预测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-method-provides-a-more-accurate-way-to-predict-dementia-up-to-nine-years-before-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240606/New-method-provides-a-more-accurate-way-to-predict-dementia-up-to-nine-years-before-diagnosis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fc3705f-da95-4311-b4af-05d98067fd32 Thu, 06 Jun 2024 07:05:00 -0400 New method provides a more accurate way to predict dementia up to nine years before diagnosis
